title: The Todd Starnes Show – September 6th, 2019
text:
Here's what happened today on The Todd Starnes Show:

Todd speaks with First Liberty Institute's Jeremy Dys about whether the Cleveland City Council will start their meetings with a prayer.

Watch the latest video at foxnews.com

Todd speaks with Secretary of Veterans Affairs Robert Wilkie about how the Trump administration is defending religious liberty.

Todd speaks with Samaritan's Purse's Cissie Graham Lynch about what her organization is doing to help those in the Bahamas affected by Hurricane Dorian.

Todd speaks with Family Research Council President Tony Perkins about the effect teaching traditional values in school can have on the next generation.
